successes.title: GoSun Grill: A Breakthrough Solar Oven that Cooks at Night
successes.description: Easier, faster and more delicious, this fuel-free cooker can bake, boil or fry a meal for eight, using only the Sun... day or night

Pledges.description:
GoSun Design Process Book: E-VERSION
(MSRP $15, save $14) - Enjoy a digital version of GoSun's  User-Centered Design Experience in Guatemala explaining the technology as well as the design process for exploring new ideas/inventions

GoSun Design Process Book
(MSRP $40, save $15) - Enjoy this paperback version of GoSun's User-Centered Design Experience in Guatemala explaining the technology as well as the design process for exploring new ideas/inventions

GoSun T-Shirt + Design Process Book
(MSRP $70, save $20) - If you like what you see, here's something you can wear. Also, Enjoy this paperback version of GoSun's User-Centered Design Experience in Guatemala explaining the technology as well as the design process for exploring new ideas/inventions

Back A Movement + T-Shirt + Process Book
(MSRP $220, save $70) - If you want to accelerate GoSun's work in developing countries, this reward level will allow a family in need to be equipped with a lower cost version of the GoSun Grill.  You'll receive a personal, in-depth update about your contribution and the lives affected. In addition, you'll get a T-shirt and GoSun's Design Process Book.

GoSun Grill (GO-GETTER aka Early Bird)
(MSRP $549, save $200) - Be the first to own a GoSun Grill. Everything needed for your next BBQ or picnic.  This Standard Package includes: Evacuated Tube Pyrex® Oven, Parabolic Reflectors/Shields, Stainless Steel Frame, Two Cooking Carts, Temperature Gauge, Easy-Carry Grips, Cleaning Tool, User's Guide, Two-Year Warranty and One-Year CookBook Subscription
*earn Free Shipping with our Rewards Program

GoSun Grill
(MSRP $549, save $150) - Be one of the first to own a GoSun Grill. Everything needed for your next BBQ or picnic.  This Standard Package includes: Evacuated Tube Pyrex® Oven, Parabolic Reflectors/Shields, Stainless Steel Frame, Two Cooking Carts, Temperature Gauge, Easy Carry Grips, Cleaning Tool, User's Guide, Two-Year Warranty and One-Year CookBook Subscription
*earn Free Shipping with our Rewards Program

GoSun Grill + Stand (GO-GETTER) 
(MSRP $699, save $250) - Be the first to own a GoSun Grill + Stand. Everything needed for a complete backyard party.  This Package includes above GoSun Grill plus:  Stainless Steel Stand/Table and Nylon Grill Cover
*earn $50 off shipping with our Rewards Program

GoSun Grill + Battery (GO-GETTER) 
(MSRP $699, save $250) - Be the first to own a GoSun Grill + Battery. Everything needed for a fuel-free kitchen, day or night.  This Package includes above GoSun Grill plus the Long-Lasting Thermal Battery Module
*earn $50 off shipping with our Rewards Program

GoSun Grill + Stand
(MSRP $699, save $200) - Be one of the first to own a GoSun Grill + Stand. Everything needed for a complete backyard party.  This Package includes above GoSun Grill plus:  Stainless Steel Grill Stand/Table and Nylon Grill Cover
*earn $50 off shipping with our Rewards Program

GoSun Grill + Battery
